abstract.t: This document describes the SAP - the session directory announcement protocol, and the related issues affecting security and scalability that should be taken into account by the implementors of session directory tools. It is a companion document to draft-ietf-mmusic-sdp. This document is a product of the Multiparty Multimedia Session Control are solicited and should be addressed to the working group's mailing list at confctrl@isi.edu and/or the author.
